resources.resource: Thank you for visiting my personal web space. Maybe you know something about me already but let me give you a refreshing summary.
I am a young, motivated and passionate Web developer specialized not only in the .Net framework and C# development but also the open source technologies like PHP and JavaScript.

I worked over 4 years at Trust5 in Dublin in Ireland, a company in partnership with EA Mobile. At the end of 2013, I joined Trépia, an IT service provider company, and started a long term mission at Xerox Transports Inc. in Valence, France.

Wrapped around the work, you will find what motivates and inspires me constantly: my fiancée and wife to be, my bikes, my ukulele, my camera, my kitchen, my songs and music sheets, my sunglasses, my hiking boots and more.
